bill_profile.bill_title: Mortgage Assistance Made by Financial Companies

bill_profile.bill_title: Armed Forces Draft Between Ages 18 and 25
bill_profile.bill_summary: Requires all persons in the United States between the ages of 18 and 25 to perform national service, either as a member of the uniformed services or in civilian service in furtherance of the national defense and homeland security, to authorize the induction of persons in the uniformed services during wartime to meet end-strength requirements of the uniformed services, and for other purposes.

bill_profile.bill_title: Conservatorships of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac
bill_profile.bill_summary: Establishes a term certain for the conservatorships of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac; provides conditions for continued operation of such enterprises; provides for the wind down of such operations and the dissolution of such enterprises.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on FINANCIAL SERVICES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Interstate Commerce for Suicide Promotion
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the use of interstate commerce for suicide promotion.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Criteria Used to Grant Waivers for Health Care
bill_profile.bill_summary: Requires greater transparency concerning the criteria used to grant waivers to the job-killing health care law and to ensure that applications for such waivers are treated in a fair and consistent manner, irrespective of the applicant's political contributions or association with a labor union, a health plan provided for under a collective bargaining agreement, or another organized labor group.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on ENERGY AND COMMERCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Implementation of Health Reform Law
bill_profile.bill_summary: Delays the implementation of the health reform law in the United States until there is final resolution in pending lawsuits.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on ENERGY AND COMMERCE.
Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on WAYS AND MEANS.

Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES.
Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on APPROPRIATIONS.
Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on RULES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Changes Made by Health Care Reform
bill_profile.bill_summary: Repeals changes made by health care reform Laws to the Medicare exception to the prohibition on certain physician referrals for hospitals.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on ENERGY AND COMMERCE.
Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on WAYS AND MEANS.

bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to terminate incentives for alcohol fuels.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on WAYS AND MEANS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Construction of Wastewater Treatment Works
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to assist municipalities that would experience a significant hardship raising the revenue necessary to finance projects and activities for the construction of wastewater treatment works, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on TRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Tax Deductions Equal to Fair Market Value
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that a deduction equal to fair market value shall be allowed for charitable contributions of literary, musical, artistic, or scholarly compositions created by the donor.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on WAYS AND MEANS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Revenue Collection for Nonmilitary Purposes
bill_profile.bill_summary: Affirms the religious freedom of taxpayers who are conscientiously opposed to participation in war, to provide that the income, estate, or gift tax payments of such taxpayers be used for nonmilitary purposes; creates the Religious Freedom Peace Tax Fund to receive such tax payments; improves revenue collection, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on WAYS AND MEANS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Royalty Rate for Soda Ash
bill_profile.bill_summary: Extends the current royalty rate for soda ash.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Railroads used in Transportation to Nazi Camps
bill_profile.bill_summary: Ensures that the courts of the United States may provide an impartial forum for claims brought by United States citizens and others against any railroad organized as a separate legal entity, arising from the deportation of United States citizens and others to Nazi concentration camps on trains owned or operated by such railroad, and by the heirs and survivors of such persons, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on JUDICIARY.
Additionally referred to HOUSE Committee on FOREIGN AFFAIRS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Innovative Child Welfare Strategies

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To HOUSE Committee on ENERGY AND COMMERCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Incentives and Loopholes That Encourage Illegal Aliens
bill_profile.bill_summary: Removes the incentives and loopholes that encourage illegal aliens to come to the United States to live and work; provides additional resources to local law enforcement and Federal border and immigration officers, and for other purposes.

bill_profile.bill_title: Control of the District of Columbia National Guard

bill_profile.bill_title: Statewide Transportation Planning
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Environment and Public Works Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends title 23, United States Code, to incorporate regional transportation planning organizations into statewide transportation planning, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENVIRONMENT AND PUBLIC WORKS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Incentive to Reinvest Foreign Shipping Earnings
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the shipping investment withdrawal rules in section 955 and to provide an incentive to reinvest foreign shipping earnings in the United States.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Processing Delays on Freedom of Information
bill_profile.bill_summary: Establishes the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Alaskan Railroad Corporation Right of Way
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey a railroad right of way between North Pole, Alaska, and Delta Junction, Alaska, to the Alaska Railroad Corporation.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Hydropower Improvements
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Improves hydropower, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Hydrokinetic Renewable Energy Research
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Promotes marine and hydrokinetic renewable energy research and development, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Tax Provisions Generated by Hydropower Resources
bill_profile.bill_summary: Extends certain Federal benefits and income tax provisions to energy generated by hydropower resources.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Rebuilding Over-Fished Fisheries
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to extend the authorized period for rebuilding of certain overfished fisheries, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on COMMERCE, SCIENCE, AND TRANSPORTATION.

bill_profile.bill_title: Fraud in Small Business Contracting
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Small Business and Entrepreneurship Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Prevents fraud in small business contracting, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on SMALL BUSINESS AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP.

bill_profile.bill_title: Deportation to Nazi Concentration Camps by Train
bill_profile.bill_summary: Ensures that the courts of the United States may provide an impartial forum for claims brought by United States citizens and others against any railroad organized as a separate legal entity, arising from the deportation of United States citizens and others to Nazi concentration camps on trains owned or operated by such railroad, and by the heirs and survivors of such persons.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Sell Lands Suitable for Disposal
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to sell certain Federal lands in Arizona, Colorado, Idaho, Montana, Nebraska, Nevada, New Mexico, Oregon, Utah, and Wyoming, previously identified as suitable for disposal, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Quileute Indian Tribe Tsunami and Flood Protection
bill_profile.bill_summary: Provides the Quileute Indian Tribe Tsunami and Flood Protection, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on INDIAN AFFAIRS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Guarantees for Debt Issued on Behalf of Catastrophes
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Establishes a program to provide guarantees for debt issued by or on behalf of State catastrophe insurance programs to assist in the financial recovery from earthquakes, earthquake-induced landslides, volcanic eruptions, and tsunamis.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on BANKING, HOUSING AND URBAN AFFAIRS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Incarcerating Undocumented Aliens Charged with a Felony
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for compensation to States incarcerating undocumented aliens charged with a felony or two or more misdemeanors.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: State Criminal Alien Assistance Program
bill_profile.bill_summary: Authorizes to be appropriated $950,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 2012 through 2015 to carry out the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Importance of International Nuclear Safety Cooperation
bill_profile.bill_summary: Underscores the importance of international nuclear safety cooperation for operating power reactors; encourages the efforts of the Convention on Nuclear Safety; supports progress in improving nuclear safety; enhances the public availability of nuclear safety information.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FOREIGN RELATIONS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Provides Access to Safe Drinking Water
bill_profile.bill_summary: Provides 100,000,000 people with first-time access to safe drinking water and sanitation on a sustainable basis within six years by improving the capacity of the United States Government to fully implement the Senator Paul Simon Water for the Poor Act of 2005.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FOREIGN RELATIONS.

bill_profile.bill_title: The EB 5 Regional Center Program
bill_profile.bill_summary: Permanently reauthorizes the EB-5 Regional Center Program.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Payments to Qualified Health Centers and Rural Clinics
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends title XIX of the Social Security Act to direct Medicaid Electronic Health Records incentive payments to federally qualified health centers and rural health clinics.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Coverage for Annuity Purposes
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends subchapter II of chapter 84 of title 5, United States Code, to prohibit coverage for annuity purposes for any individual hired as a Federal employee after 2012.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on HOMELAND SECURITY AND GOVERNMENTAL AFFAIRS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Permanent Background Check System
bill_profile.bill_summary: Amends the National Child Protection Act of 1993 to establish a permanent background check system.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Federal Natural Hazards Reduction Programs
bill_profile.bill_summary: Reauthorizes Federal natural hazards reduction programs, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on COMMERCE, SCIENCE, AND TRANSPORTATION.

bill_profile.bill_title: Mineral Rights in Montana
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Energy and Natural Resources Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Authorizes the conveyance of mineral rights by the Secretary of the Interior in the State of Montana, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES.

bill_profile.bill_title: Waiting Period Waiver for Huntington's Disease
bill_profile.bill_summary: Requires the Commissioner of Social Security to revise the medical and evaluation criteria for determining disability in a person diagnosed with Huntington's Disease and to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare eligibility for individuals disabled by Huntington's Disease.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Awareness Activities for Bone and Skin Diseases
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Health, Education, Labor and Pensions Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Expands the research and awareness activities of the National Institute of Arthritis and Musculoskeletal and Skin Diseases and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention with respect to scleroderma, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on HEALTH, EDUCATION, LABOR AND PENSIONS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Criteria used to Grant Waivers for Health Care Law
bill_profile.bill_summary: Requires greater transparency concerning the criteria used to grant waivers to the job-killing health care law and to ensure that applications for such waivers are treated in a fair and consistent manner, irrespective of the applicant's political contributions or association with a labor union, a health plan provided for under a collective bargaining agreement, or another organized labor group.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: McKinney Lake National Fish Hatchery to North Carolina
bill_profile.bill_location: Senate Environment and Public Works Committee
bill_profile.bill_summary: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to convey the McKinney Lake National Fish Hatchery to the State of North Carolina, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on ENVIRONMENT AND PUBLIC WORKS.

bill_profile.bill_title: Efficient Investments and Infrastructure Financing
bill_profile.bill_summary: Facilitates efficient investments and financing of infrastructure projects and new job creation through the establishment of an American Infrastructure Financing Authority; provides for an extension of the exemption from the alternative minimum tax treatment for certain tax-exempt bonds, and for other purposes.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Read second time.
To SENATE Committee on FINANCE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Celebrating Greek and American Democracy
bill_profile.bill_summary: Recognizes the 190th anniversary of the independence of Greece and celebrating Greek and American democracy.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To SENATE Committee on FOREIGN RELATIONS.
In SENATE. Discharged from SENATE Committee on FOREIGN RELATIONS.
In SENATE. Passed SENATE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Campus Fire Safety Month
bill_profile.bill_summary: Designates September 2011 as "Campus Fire Safety Month".

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To SENATE Committee on JUDICIARY.

bill_profile.bill_title: Belarus Elections Meeting International Standards
bill_profile.bill_summary: Condemns the December 19, 2010, elections in Belarus, and to call for the immediate release of all political prisoners and for new elections that meet international standards.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Passed SENATE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Honors Triangle Shirtwaist Company Fire in 1911
bill_profile.bill_summary: Recognizes the 100th anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Company fire in New York City on March 25, 1911, and designating the week of March 21, 2011, through March 25, 2011, as the "100th Anniversary of the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory Fire Remembrance Week".

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Passed SENATE.

bill_profile.bill_title: National Association of Junior Auxiliaries Day
bill_profile.bill_summary: Designates April 4, 2011, as "National Association of Junior Auxiliaries Day".

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
In SENATE. Passed SENATE.

bill_profile.bill_title: Investment Relations Between the U.S. and Brazil
bill_profile.bill_summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate on the importance of strengthening investment relations between the United States and Brazil.

status_action.action_text: INTRODUCED.
To SENATE Committee on FOREIGN RELATIONS.
